location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 18 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter is virtually identical to John Beaumont's letter to William Hornby dated 17 January 1779 (item IOR/R/15/1/3, pp 10-11). An additional note states that Hadjee Abdullah arrived on 16 January 1779 from Galfar with news that the captured vessel's crew are well and its cargo remains untouched. It is also stated that although large ships cannot approach Galfar, second rate cruisers such as the Drakeor Eaglecould get to within musket shot of where the captured vessel is believed to be held. Shipped by Shaikh [Isa's?] dow.
